data.title: The Mad Padre's Wargames Page: Napoleon's Bathtub ... And Other Sights From Italy
data.meta_description: I am happy to say that I am back from Italy.  Madame Padre and I decided that Italy is a word meaning “Beautiful Land of Delicious Food” a...
